title: 5.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Prepare a document of two to three pages on the different layers of the atmosphere.
1. Add a header and footer to your document.
2. Insert page numbers.
3. Format the pages using page colors and borders to make your document attractive

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
